channel.title: Barplot on Andrew's Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Barplot on Andrew's Data Science Blog

item.title: Barplot
item.description: How many homeruns each team hit in 1980. library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) df<-Teams%>% filter(yearID==1980)%>% select(name,HR)%>% arrange(HR) df$name<-factor(df$name,levels=df$name) ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=df,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat="identity",color="blue",fill="white")+ coord_flip()
